name: Breaking Box: Rush!
description:
To succeed in reaching the endpoint, box must take the second step.
This is a physics-based puzzle game where rushing is the only option.
You need to collect candies in each level and reach the endpoint.

Features:
  • 30 levels
  • 90 achievements

Credits:
Supported by the team of Dotoyou Games, who were involved in the development of Breaking Box, which unfortunately experienced poor sales.
